## 

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
talk <- read.csv(file="talks.csv", header = FALSE, sep = ",")
colnames(talk) <- c("Date", "Topic/Location")
kable(talk) %>%
  kable_styling(c("striped", "bordered"),full_width = FALSE)
```
